pages.text: $(li)The Marsh is a biome composed mostly by Water, Clay and Mud.$(br)$(li)In this wet place you can find some water vegetation, like Lilypads, Seagrass, Duckweed, and Tall Cattail.$(br)$(li)Some aquatic animals like Perchs, Pikes, Slabfishs and Squids can be found here too.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Marsh$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
